column5: I know that most everybody has their time pieces set one hour back to Eastern Standard Time. But have you checked every smoke/gas detector in the house? I know it comes up twice a year but it really is important. How much of a gambler are you?
Thanks Roy !!!! I did my smoke det batteries yesterday !!!!! I even put it on my fb page to help people remember !!! And do your carbon monoxide det too if ya got them !!!!
Good point Roy...and i might add...drain your hose bibs and put away your garden hoses
Good point Roy. I didn't think of that but after reading this I just changed the batteries.
